channel.title: Development on Chai Kanchan
channel.description: Recent content in Development on Chai Kanchan

item.title: Hello world!
item.description: This is a customary ‘Hello world!’ post to check out whether everything’s working on this site, which is not only my personal page but also a work-in-progress learning project for web dev. This initial release is made with the Hugo static site generator, as a straightforward static site serves my needs (articles and a portfolio) well. I’m developing the theme in concert with the site as part of webdev learning, and as such it’s a pretty simple patchwork at the moment.
